content.rendered:
Creative Marketing Designer – Tel Aviv, Israel

What was your very first job?

My first job was working at my family’s famous bakery in Israel where I was surrounded by the most delicious cakes, cookies, and treats… it wasn’t easy.

How did you get into your current job or field?

I was always fascinated by human psychology and grew up dancing, so creativity was a big part of my life. I graduated college with a degree in cognitive science and fulfilled my passion for the arts by enrolling in a UX design bootcamp, which was one of the best decisions I made!

What’s a fun fact about you that not many people know?

I love cars and go to the San Francisco Auto Show every year with my dad!

What is your favorite activity or hobby that you enjoy outside of work?

Wow, I have so many. I LOVE the snow, so any snow activities (snowboarding, skiing, just being in the snow), music festivals, hiking, hanging out with friends, and traveling!

What is your best memory or favorite thing about working at Codefresh?

The energy in the company is so fun! I feel that I can always turn to anyone, whether it’s asking for help or just to chat. We are also incredibly fortunate to have such an awesome People Team. They host lots of fun activities and make our global company feel close knit so much so that I find myself working more from the office than from my home!

excerpt.rendered: The energy in the company is so fun! I feel that I can always turn to anyone, whether it’s asking for help or just to chat.
